name: Including Adam FX 2 flexi + fishbrain -  operation fatcap + Fishbrain and WitchCraft

per_frame_init_1=x1 = 0;
per_frame_init_2=y1 = 0;
per_frame_1=vvb =max(0,min(1,vvb));
per_frame_2=vvm =max(0,min(1,vvm));
per_frame_3=vvt =max(0,min(1,vvt));
per_frame_4=vb = vb*0.85 + (1-vb)*pow(bass,2)*0.01;
per_frame_5=vvb = vvb*0.95 + (1-vvb)*vb*0.2;
per_frame_6=vm = vm*0.85 + (1-vm)*pow(mid,2)*0.01;
per_frame_7=vvm = vvm*0.95 + (1-vvm)*vm*0.2;
per_frame_8=vt = vt*0.85 + (1-vt)*pow(treb,2)*0.01;
per_frame_9=vvt = vvt*0.95 + (1-vvt)*vt*0.2;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q1 = vvb;//0.5 + vb - vvb;
per_frame_12=q2 = vvm;//0.5 + vm - vvm;
per_frame_13=q3 = vvt;//0.5 + vt - vvt;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=v=0.08*(60/fps);
per_frame_16=d = v*0.35;
per_frame_17=bb = bb + vvb*v - d;
per_frame_18=mm = mm + vvm*v - d;
per_frame_19=tt = tt + vvt*v - d;
per_frame_20=q6 = bb;
per_frame_21=q5 = mm;
per_frame_22=q4 = tt;
per_frame_23=zoom = 0.995;
per_frame_24=q9 = 0.8;
per_frame_25=q10 = 0.88 + vt - vb;
per_pixel_1=n=15;
per_pixel_2=t = q5*2-4;
per_pixel_3=w= q4-q6;
per_pixel_4=v = 10;
per_pixel_5=X2 = x-0.5;
per_pixel_6=Y2 = y-0.5;
per_pixel_7=X1 = sin(w)*X2 -cos(w)*Y2;
per_pixel_8=Y1 = cos(w)*X2 +sin(w)*Y2;
per_pixel_9=x = X1;
per_pixel_10=y = Y1;
per_pixel_11=dx1 = 0.01*(cos((-x+y)*n+t) + sin((x+y)*n+t));
per_pixel_12=dy1 = 0.01*(cos((x-y)*n-t) + sin((-x-y)*n-t));
per_pixel_13=dx2 = sin(-w)*dx1 - cos(-w)*dy1;
per_pixel_14=dy2 = cos(-w)*dx1 + sin(-w)*dy1;
per_pixel_15=dx = v*dx2;
per_pixel_16=dy = v*dy2;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    //Smudge code based off of the mix in code from Geiss
warp_7=`    float pic = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv_orig*aspect.xy*.5+.1*roam_cos+.1*time).xyz;
warp_8=`    float lum = lum(pic);
warp_9=`    float use_it = abs(lum+.25 - (0.5+roam_cos.xy*0.15));
warp_10=`    float LFNoise = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, pic-(uv.yx*8 + (time*.15)));
warp_11=`    use_it = saturate(1-use_it - (1.5-LFNoise));
warp_12=`    float tex = lerp(ret, pic, use_it.xxx)*1.05;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`ret=tex;
warp_15=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_16=`    ret *= 0.95; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret += GetBlur1(uv)*0.4;
comp_5=` 
comp_6=`    // palettize:
comp_7=`    ret = pow(ret, float3(0.5, 0.8, 1.7));
comp_8=`    ret = pow(ret, float3(1.7-(bass*.5), 1.7-(treb*.5), 1.7-(mid*.5)));
comp_9=`   
comp_10=`    //ret.xyz *= 2; // a little bit of overbright
comp_11=`}
comp_12=`
comp_13=`
